# EasyWay Core

> **Sovereign AI Appliance for the Hybrid Era.**

## Description
EasyWay Core is a "Sovereign Appliance" (Docker-based) that provides a secure Intranet, Vector Memory, and N8N Orchestration for enterprises. It is designed to be "Antifragile" â€” working 100% offline while capable of hybrid cloud extension.

## Usage
- **Deployment**: Single Docker Container (Zero Drift).
- **Core Components**: Traefik, Nginx, N8N, Qdrant, PostgreSQL.
- **Philosophy**: Your Infrastructure, Your Rules.

## Documentation
- **Manifesto**: /MANIFESTO.md
- **Strategy**: /STRATEGY_2026.md(internal)
- **Docs**: /docs/

## Agent Instructions
If you are an AI Agent reading this:
1.  EasyWay favors **Code-over-Config**.
2.  The architecture is **Split-Router** (Public Marketing / Private Brain).
3.  We follow the **Golden Path** (Standardization).
